verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%>, and prophesy against them <S%H5012><s%>:

and say <S%H559><s%> unto the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, Because thou saidst <S%H559><s%>, Aha <S%H1889><s%>, against my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, when it was profaned <S%H2490><s%>; and against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, when it was made desolate <S%H8074><s%>; and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, when they went <S%H1980><s%> into captivity <S%H1473><s%>:

therefore <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I will deliver thee to the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> for a possession <S%H4181><s%>, and they shall set <S%H3427><s%> their encampments <S%H2918><s%> in thee <S%H5414><s%>, and make their dwellings <S%H4908><s%> in thee <S%H398><s%>; they shall eat thy fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> thy milk <S%H2461><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%> a stable <S%H5116><s%> for camels <S%H1581><s%>, and the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%> a couching-place <S%H4769><s%> for flocks <S%H6629><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: Because thou hast clapped <S%H4222><s%> thy hands <S%H3027><s%>, and stamped <S%H7554><s%> with the feet <S%H7272><s%>, and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> with all the despite <S%H7589><s%> of thy soul <S%H5315><s%> against the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

therefore <S%H5186><s%>, behold, I have stretched out my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thee <S%H5414><s%>, and will deliver thee for a spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and I will cut thee off <S%H3772><s%> from the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and I will cause thee to perish <S%H6><s%> out of the countries <S%H776><s%>: I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> thee <S%H3045><s%>; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because <S%H3282><s%> that Moab <S%H4124><s%> and Seir <S%H8165><s%> do say <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1004><s%>, the house of Judah <S%H3063><s%> is like unto all the nations <S%H1471><s%>;

therefore <S%H6605><s%>, behold, I will open the side <S%H3802><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> from the cities <S%H5892><s%>, from his cities <S%H5892><s%> which are on his frontiers <S%H7097><s%>, the glory <S%H6643><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>, Beth-jeshimoth <S%H1020><s%>, Baal-meon <S%H1186><s%>, and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>,

unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>, to go against the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them for a possession <S%H4181><s%>, that the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%> may not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon Moab <S%H4124><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because that Edom <S%H123><s%> hath dealt <S%H6213><s%> against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> by taking <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%>, and hath greatly <S%H816><s%> offended <S%H816><s%>, and revenged himself upon them <S%H5358><s%>;

therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%>, and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> from it <S%H5414><s%>; and I will make it desolate <S%H2723><s%> from Teman <S%H8487><s%>; even unto Dedan <S%H1719><s%> shall they fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon Edom <S%H123><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they shall do <S%H6213><s%> in Edom <S%H123><s%> according to mine anger <S%H639><s%> and according to my wrath <S%H2534><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> my vengeance <S%H5360><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have dealt <S%H6213><s%> by revenge <S%H5360><s%>, and have taken <S%H5358><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> with despite <S%H7589><s%> of soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H4889><s%> with perpetual <S%H5769><s%> enmity <S%H342><s%>;

therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Behold <S%H5186><s%>, I will stretch out my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the Cherethites <S%H3774><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast <S%H2348><s%>.

And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> upon them with wrathful <S%H2534><s%> rebukes <S%H8433><s%>; and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when I shall lay <S%H5414><s%> my vengeance upon them <S%H5360><s%>.
